capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's forehead has this weird mark that looks like a lightning bolt with a knife stuck in it. I've seen him get into some pretty intense fights, but I've never seen anything like this before. It's definitely not normal.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is actually quite clear-cut. He comes from a very traditional wizarding family background, with his parents being James and Lily Potter, who were both well-known in the wizarding world for their bravery and sacrifice. I mean, it's not like there's any doubt about where he got his magical abilities from - his parents were both incredibly talented wizards themselves.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville's lineage is indeed quite impressive. I mean, being a pure-blood wizard from the Gaunt family, he comes from a long line of powerful wizards with a rich history in the magical world. It's no wonder he was able to master those complex spells so quickly.
